#Introduction to Latenight Smalltalk.

= Introduction =

Latenate Smalltalk currently consists of two eclipse projects:
* Smalltalk
* Smalltalk Eclipse

*Smalltalk* containts the compiler. Actually it containts two compilers: JavassistUniverse translates Smalltalk classes directly to bytecode. JavasourceUniverse translates Smalltalk classes to java source code. Additionally *Smalltalk* is an eclipse plugin.
*Smalltalk Eclipse* is an Eclipse plugin which uses the *Smalltalk* plugin. *Smalltalk Eclipse* is based on the Eclipse DLTK projects infrastructure and provides the first parts of a Smalltalk IDE. Currently it provides a Smalltalk Editor with semantic highlighting. Thanks to the DLTK infrastructure, it automatically provide also a class outline view.
